Key Match Events: Charlie Morton gave up a three-run homer to Brandon Marsh in the sixth inning
Rookie Grant Holmes surrendered a decisive two-run homer to Nick Castellanos in the seventh
Post-Match Reflections: Braves manager Brian Snitker says no player has been more valuable to a team this season than Ozuna to the Braves
Olson said, “Charlie threw well, worked himself out of some jams, but two big swings on some pitches, and they scored five runs from it.”
Miscellaneous Highlights: Marcell Ozuna has a chance to do something else quite rare: Win the Triple Crown
Ozuna leads the NL in average (.308) and RBIs and is second in homers with 37, five behind Ohtani
Others: The Braves are running out of time if they hope to win a seventh consecutive NL East title
